title: iFrames – Samples
description: Sample content demonstrating Electric Book support for a wide range of book features.
content: iFrames You can embed an iFrame in a book, for instance an embeddable quiz like Betterquiz. At this stage, it’s best to use Liquid control flow tags to show text-only alternatives in PDF and epub, and embedded iFrames only in web output. Here’s an iFrame showing the modern book production process.
